trans-unit.source: Defines the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> base class and a set of types that derive from it and that correspond to Microsoft .NET Framework controls.
trans-unit.target: Define a classe base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> e um conjunto de tipos que derivam dela e que correspondem aos controles do Microsoft .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> exposes the corresponding Microsoft .NET Framework control to Microsoft UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Cada <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> expõe o controle do Microsoft .NET Framework correspondente para a automação de interface do usuário da Microsoft.
